description: Yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. As the founder of Offcourse and creator of Superconnectors, he combines entrepreneurship, thinking, and coding. Based in Taipei, he focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores the evolution of 'ecosystem' from biology to metaphor, introducing 'ecosystem architecture' as an approach to designing modern, decentralized organizations. Yeehaa advocates for impactful and inclusive internet, addressing fragmentation and embracing diversity in digital landscapes. His courses cover topics like nurturing ecosystems, preserving internet freedom, and practicing innovation through strategic thinking and unconventional tools.
blurb: Yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, PhD, entrepreneur. Transforming education, advocating inclusive internet. Explores 'ecosystem architecture' for modern organizations. Courses on nurturing digital ecosystems and innovation.
